data.prayer: Lord, teach your Word to the people of the the state of Gitega, so that they can follow your ways all their life.
data.verse: Teach me, Lord, the way of your decrees, that I may follow it to the end.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Gitega, Burundi
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Gitega, Burundi to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.section_summary: On average, 199 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Gitega, Burundi.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.
Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Gitega to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Gitega, Burundi to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Swahili people. 0.7% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Father, see the suffering of your people in the state of Gitega. Deliver all those who have not forgotten your Word.
data.verse: Look on my suffering and deliver me, for I have not forgotten your law.

data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Gitega, Burundi and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Gitega.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.
